name: Attack Balls Bubble Shooter
description:
*Over 6,500,000 downloads! See why so many people are addicted to Attack Balls!*

*** SUPPORTS ALL DEVICES INCLUDING IPHONE 7 PLUS ***

1. Benefits
- endless number of game levels
- iOS 9.0 Compatible
- constant FREE updates

2. How to play
Slide the bottom ball by your finger in the direction of the balls with the same color

3. How to win
Destroy all the balls on the game board

For more information or support, please visit http://www.bazilsoft.com
